title: Triangle of My Heart: A memoir of family, loss, and faith.
description: From the moment I looked at my sister and saw she had been crying, I knew that something was terribly wrong. I felt numb and completely blindsided.Told from a loving daughterâ€™s perspective, Triangle of My Heart explores three generations of interconnected relationships framed by AML leukemia, chemotherapy, and the subsequent turmoil it created.
author: Deborah A. Kirschner
